00014 ostream& operator<<(ostream &os, const ESpinState &ss)
00015 {
00016    if      (ss == kSPIN_UP)   os << "+";
00017    else if (ss == kSPIN_DOWN) os << "-";
00018    else if (ss == kSPIN_NULL) os << ".";
00019    else                       os << "*";
00020 
00021    return os;
00022 }

00026 RunConfig::RunConfig() : TObject(), fPolarimeters(), fTargets(), fMeasTypes(),
00027    fTargetOrients(), fBeamEnergies(), fSpinStates(), fAsymTypes()
00028 {
00029    fPolarimeters.insert(kB1U);
00030    fPolarimeters.insert(kY1D);
00031    fPolarimeters.insert(kB2D);
00032    fPolarimeters.insert(kY2U);
00033 
00034    fMeasTypes.insert(kMEASTYPE_UNKNOWN);
00035    fMeasTypes.insert(kMEASTYPE_ALPHA  );
00036    fMeasTypes.insert(kMEASTYPE_SWEEP  );
00037    fMeasTypes.insert(kMEASTYPE_FIXED  );
00038    fMeasTypes.insert(kMEASTYPE_RAMP   );
00039    fMeasTypes.insert(kMEASTYPE_EMIT_SCAN);
00040 
00041    fTargetOrients.insert(kTARGET_H);
00042    fTargetOrients.insert(kTARGET_V);
00043 
00044    fBeams.insert(kBLUE_BEAM);
00045    fBeams.insert(kYELLOW_BEAM);
00046 
00047    fRings.insert(kBLUE_RING);
00048    fRings.insert(kYELLOW_RING);
00049 
00050    fBeamEnergies.insert(kINJECTION);
00051    fBeamEnergies.insert(kBEAM_ENERGY_100);
00052    fBeamEnergies.insert(kBEAM_ENERGY_250);
00053    fBeamEnergies.insert(kBEAM_ENERGY_255);
00054 
00055    fSpinStates.insert(kSPIN_DOWN);
00056    fSpinStates.insert(kSPIN_NULL);
00057    fSpinStates.insert(kSPIN_UP);
00058 
00059    fAsymTypes.insert(kPHYS_ASYM);
00060    fAsymTypes.insert(kGEOM_ASYM);
00061    fAsymTypes.insert(kLUMI_ASYM);
00062 
00063    // Initialize targets
00064    PolarimeterIdSetConstIter iPolId = fPolarimeters.begin();
00065 
00066    for ( ; iPolId != fPolarimeters.end(); ++iPolId) {
00067       TargetOrientSetIter iTgtOrient = fTargetOrients.begin();
00068       for ( ; iTgtOrient != fTargetOrients.end(); ++iTgtOrient) {
00069          for ( UShort_t iTgtId=1; iTgtId<=6; iTgtId++) {
00070             fTargets.insert(Target(*iPolId, *iTgtOrient, iTgtId));
00071          }
00072       }
00073    }
00074 
00075 }

00085 string RunConfig::AsString(EPolarimeterId polId)
00086 {
00087    switch (polId) {
00088    case kB1U:
00089       return "B1U";
00090    case kY1D:
00091       return "Y1D";
00092    case kB2D:
00093       return "B2D";
00094    case kY2U:
00095       return "Y2U";
00096    default:
00097       return "UNK";
00098    }
00099 }

00215 UShort_t RunConfig::AsIndex(ESpinState spinState)
00216 {

00275 Color_t RunConfig::AsColor(ESpinState spin)
00276 {
00277    switch (spin) {
00278    case kSPIN_DOWN:
00279       return kGreen;
00280    case kSPIN_NULL:
00281       return kBlack;
00282    case kSPIN_UP:
00283       return kRed;
00284    default:
00285       return kBlack;
00286    }
00287 }

00291 Color_t RunConfig::AsColor(EAsymType asymType)
00292 {
00293    switch (asymType) {
00294    case kPHYS_ASYM:
00295       return kBlue;
00296    case kGEOM_ASYM:
00297       return kMagenta + 2;
00298    case kLUMI_ASYM:
00299       return kRed - 2;
00300    default:
00301       return kBlack;
00302    }
00303 }

00305 
00307 Color_t RunConfig::AsColor(UShort_t chId)
00308 {
00309    if (chId < 1 || chId > N_SILICON_CHANNELS) return kBlack;
00310 
00311    switch ( GetDetectorId(chId) ) {
00312    case 1:
00313       return kMagenta + 2 - GetDetectorChannelId(chId);
00314    case 2:
00315       return kBlue + 2 - GetDetectorChannelId(chId);
00316    case 3:
00317       return kCyan + 2 - GetDetectorChannelId(chId);
00318    case 4:
00319       return kGreen + 2 - GetDetectorChannelId(chId);
00320    case 5:
00321       return kYellow + 2 - GetDetectorChannelId(chId);
00322    case 6:
00323       return kRed + 2 - GetDetectorChannelId(chId);
00324    default:
00325       return kBlack;
00326    }
00327 
00328 }
00329 
00330 
00332 TAttMarker RunConfig::AsMarker(ETargetOrient targetOrient, EPolarimeterId polId)
00333 {
00334    Color_t color = RunConfig::AsColor(polId);
00335 
00336    TAttMarker marker;
00337    marker.SetMarkerSize(2);
00338 
00339    switch (targetOrient) {
00340    case kTARGET_H:
00341       marker.SetMarkerStyle(kFullTriangleUp);
00342       marker.SetMarkerColor(color-3);
00343       break;
00344    case kTARGET_V:
00345       marker.SetMarkerStyle(kFullTriangleDown);
00346       marker.SetMarkerColor(color+2);
00347       break;
00348    default:
00349       break;
00350    }
00351 
00352    return marker;
00353 }

00357 EBeamId RunConfig::GetBeamId(EPolarimeterId polId)
00358 {
00359    switch (polId) {
00360    case kB1U:
00361       return kBLUE_BEAM;
00362    case kY1D:
00363       return kYELLOW_BEAM;
00364    case kB2D:
00365       return kBLUE_BEAM;
00366    case kY2U:
00367       return kYELLOW_BEAM;
00368    default:
00369       return kUNKNOWN_BEAM;
00370    }
00371 }

00393 EStreamId RunConfig::GetStreamId(EPolarimeterId polId)
00394 {
00395    switch (polId) {
00396    case kB1U:

00398    case kY1D:

00400    case kB2D:

00402    case kY2U:
00403       return kUPSTREAM;
00404    default:
00405       return kUNKNOWN_STREAM;
00406    }

00409 
00411 UShort_t RunConfig::GetDetectorId(UShort_t chId)
00412 {
00413    if (chId >= 1 && chId <= N_SILICON_CHANNELS) 
00414       return UShort_t( (chId - 1) / NSTRIP_PER_DETECTOR) + 1;
00415    
00416    gSystem->Error("RunConfig::GetDetectorId", "Channel id is not valid");
00417    return USHRT_MAX;
00418 }
00419 
00420 
00422 UShort_t RunConfig::GetDetectorChannelId(UShort_t chId)
00423 {
00424    if (chId >= 1 && chId <= N_SILICON_CHANNELS)
00425       return chId - (GetDetectorId(chId) - 1) * NSTRIP_PER_DETECTOR;
00426    
00427    gSystem->Error("RunConfig::GetDetectorChannelId", "Channel id is not valid");
00428    return USHRT_MAX;
00429 }

00431 
00433 void RunConfig::SetBeamEnergies(BeamEnergySet beamEnergies)
00434 {
00435    fBeamEnergies.clear();
00436 
00437    BeamEnergySetIter iBE = beamEnergies.begin();
00438    for ( ; iBE != beamEnergies.end(); ++iBE)
00439    {
00440       fBeamEnergies.insert(*iBE);
00441    }
00442 }
